languages.text: "Вог'Хайг — осколок целого. То, что было раздроблено и спрятано сиротами Принца в материальной оболочке на просторах реального мира. Мы есмь отблески Предела, коему поет гимны ненависти Уралон Жестокий".

"Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."
languages.original_text: "Вог'Хайг — осколок целого. То, что было раздроблено и спрятано сиротами Принца в материальной оболочке на просторах реального мира. Мы есмь отблески Предела, коему поет гимны ненависти Уралон Жестокий".

traits.locale_text: "Vog'Hige is a shard of the whole, the one that was shattered and scattered across the realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are the glimpses of the Edge to which Uralon the Cruel sings the chants of hatred."

"Vog'Hige is a shard of the whole, the one that was shattered and scattered across the realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are the glimpses of the Edge to which Uralon the Cruel sings the chants of hatred."

"Vog'Hige is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's Orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

"Vog'Hige is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's Orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

"Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

languages.text: “沃格-希杰是某种完整之物的碎片，是被王子遗孤打碎，散落在真实世界中的武器。我们不过是锋刃的折射之光，残暴者乌拉隆唱响仇恨的赞歌，歌颂锋刃的辉煌。”
languages.original_text: "Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

traits.locale_text: “沃格-希杰是某种完整之物的碎片，是被王子遗孤打碎，散落在真实世界中的武器。我们不过是锋刃的折射之光，残暴者乌拉隆唱响仇恨的赞歌，歌颂锋刃的辉煌。”

languages.text: « Vog'Hige est un fragment de ce qui était autrefois complet : une arme qui a été brisée et disséminée dans l'espace réel par les Orphelins du Prince. Nous ne sommes que des réfractions de la Lame, celles à qui Uralon le Cruel chante ses hymnes de haine. »
languages.original_text: "Vog'Hige is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's Orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

traits.locale_text: « Vog'Hige est un fragment de ce qui était autrefois complet : une arme qui a été brisée et disséminée dans l'espace réel par les Orphelins du Prince. Nous ne sommes que des réfractions de la Lame, celles à qui Uralon le Cruel chante ses hymnes de haine. »

languages.text: 「ヴォッグとヒッジは本来一つだったもの…皇子の遺児達によって砕かれ、リアルスペース中に散らばった武器の欠片なのだ。我らは残酷なウラロンが憎しみの聖歌を歌う、刃の影に過ぎんのだ」
languages.original_text: "Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォッグとヒッジは本来一つだったもの…皇子の遺児達によって砕かれ、リアルスペース中に散らばった武器の欠片なのだ。我らは残酷なウラロンが憎しみの聖歌を歌う、刃の影に過ぎんのだ」

languages.text: «Vog'Haik es un fragmento de lo que fue un todo: un arma destrozada y dispersada por el espacio real por los Huérfanos del Príncipe. Somos solo reflejos del Filo, a lo que Uralon el Cruel dedica sus himnos de odio».
languages.original_text: "Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

traits.locale_text: «Vog'Haik es un fragmento de lo que fue un todo: un arma destrozada y dispersada por el espacio real por los Huérfanos del Príncipe. Somos solo reflejos del Filo, a lo que Uralon el Cruel dedica sus himnos de odio».

languages.text: "Vog'Hige ist ein Splitter dessen, was einst ganz war — einer Waffe, die von den Waisen des Prinzen zertrümmert und im gesamten Realraum verteilt wurde. Wir sind nur Spiegelungen des Rands, denen Uralon der Grausame seine Hymnen des Hasses vorsingt."
languages.original_text: "Vog'Hige is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's Orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."

traits.locale_text: "Vog'Hige ist ein Splitter dessen, was einst ganz war — einer Waffe, die von den Waisen des Prinzen zertrümmert und im gesamten Realraum verteilt wurde. Wir sind nur Spiegelungen des Rands, denen Uralon der Grausame seine Hymnen des Hasses vorsingt."

languages.text: "Vog'Haik; bir zamanlar bütün olanın, Prens'in yetimlerince parçalanıp gerçekuzaya saçılmış silahın bir parçasıdır. Biz, Zalim Uralon'un nefret ilahilerini okuduğu Yalım'ın kırıklarından ibaretiz."
languages.original_text: "Vog'Haik is a shard of what was once whole — a weapon that was shattered and scattered across realspace by the Prince's orphans. We are but refractions of the Edge, to which Uralon the Cruel sings his hymns of hatred."
